version_description:
completely refined version 2.0:
- improved accuracy
- improved latency
- improved rendering on large screens
- improved connection to iOS audio
- added some supporting lines to the coordinate system
- added iPad support via universal binary

- changed sampling rate to 48 kHz, improving the support for iPhone 6s and iPhone 7, and improving the quality in general
- uses the measurement mode, minimizing the amount of system-supplied signal processing
- should now have a flat frequency response curve (influenced by microphone characteristics)
